messages.content: What is the purpose of the CPlus_Ardenius custom node for ComfyUI?
The CPlus_Ardenius custom node for ComfyUI is a control box that allows users to have control over their workflow.
How can I help support the development of free custom nodes and other software?
You can help support the development of free custom nodes and other software by making a donation at the [Coffee Page](https://ko-fi.com/ardenius).
What features does the CPlus control box provide for the model and prompts input?
The CPlus control box provides features such as model, positive, negative, latent image, seed, width, height, cfg, steps, denoise, scaler, clip, and vae for the model and prompts input.
Where can I find the download link for the CPlus control box for ComfyUI?
You can find the download link for the CPlus control box for ComfyUI at the following link: [Donload link CPlus control box for ComfyUI](https://ko-fi.com/s/2e67e2ae70).
How do I manually install the CPlus control box custom node for ComfyUI?

To manually install the CPlus control box custom node for ComfyUI, you should follow these steps: 1. Click on the green button above (Code). 2. Download the zip file. 3. Extract the zip file. 4. Copy the contents to ComfyUI/custom-nodes/. 5. Restart your ComfyUI server. 6. Click (refersh) on the Comfy UI panel. 7. Double-click anywhere on your workflow and search for CPlus control box.
